Title: Uncle from the People's Liberation Army on the rostrum
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The soldier is holding a straw sandal, possibly referring to the straw sandals made and worn by Red Army soldiers during the Long March.On the blackboard: 第十一课 - 革命传统代代传 (Lesson Eleven - Revolutionary tradition passed down from generation to generation).Above the blackboard: 好好學習 (Study well).Through the window, the (former) Shanghai Race Club building can be seen.This is a print from the second edition April 1975.
